name: dracula-mantine
description: Dracula theme for mantine component library

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc && tsc -p tsconfig.types.json && cp package.json dist/package.json && cp LICENSE dist && cp README.md dist && cp screenshot.png dist
scripts.build-win: (if exist dist rd /s /q dist) && tsc && tsc -p tsconfig.types.json && copy package.json dist\package.json && copy LICENSE dist && copy README.md dist && copy screenshot.png dist

author: Kirill Stepkin
